TopicTitle: NASA Testing new Aerobraking Ship for Mars

Articles.Content:
I just saw this and my first thought was NASA should play KSP. Then I thought, the inflatable "aerobrakes" would be a cool addition to KSP.

[http://www.discovery.com/dscovrd/space/nasa-to-test-supersonic-spacecraft-next-week/?utm_source=facebook.com&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=DiscoveryChannel](http://www.discovery.com/dscovrd/space/nasa-to-test-supersonic-spacecraft-next-week/?utm_source=facebook.com&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=DiscoveryChannel)

I believe the big inflatable heatshield in Deadly Re-Entry does the same thing. I misused it for that purpose a couple times. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
